author: costin
msg: - reduced the dependency on the install or home directory. The install directory is
no longer used ( since web.dtd is part of webserver.jar, and a default web.xml is not
needed ). The context manager "home" is used only if you have relative paths, to
make them absolute. This is done in the components that need that - Tomcat.java
will do that for loggers and contexts.
-  doPriviledged in Jdk12Interceptor - otherwise include doesn't work
- reverted back to the original default for parsers ( same as in Jsp ).

author: shachor
msg: Enable shutdown from the AJP13 connector

author: shachor
msg: Add support for SSL in the JNI connector

author: shachor
msg: Integrating SSL into the JNI connector + enable shutdown from

author: costin
msg: Fix a bug in the session interceptor - we set the session if it wasn't set by somebody
